alert.note: Alert for Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Sun Valley Region; Wood River Foothills (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 05 at 2:18AM MST until March 05 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow. Additional snow accumulation up to 1 inch. Winds gusting 25 to 35 MPH. * WHERE...The Wood River Valley, Big Lost Highlands, and Copper Basin, including but not limited to Galena Summit, Ketchum, Sun Valley, Hailey, Bellevue, and Picabo. * WHEN...Until 9 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Although active snowfall will be ending, be prepared for continued slick roads and pockets of blowing and drifting snow across highways.
info.instruction: If you will be driving, slow down, use extra caution, and plan extra time to reach your destination. The latest highway conditions are available at 511.idaho.gov, the Idaho 511 App, or by calling 511.

area.areaDesc: Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Sun Valley Region; Wood River Foothills
